changelog:
### Iconify v6.7.5 (Hotfix) has arrived! It has the following new changes:

## Feature Changes:
- __Core:__
    - Migrated from AAPT to AAPT2
    - Fixed incompatibility with android 14 QPR2
    - Added APatch support
- __Xposed Menu:__
    - Added new header clocks
    - Added new lockscreen clocks. Thanks to @Corex1402 and @seklek
    - Optimized lockscreen clocks to reduce stutter
    - Fixed notification style not working on android 14 QPR2
    - Fixed QS tile text color not showing correctly on some android 14 roms
    - Added preview of battery styles in app. Thanks to @DHD2280
    - Allow clicking on header clock to open clock/calender app. Thanks to @siavash79 and @DHD2280
- __Misc:__
    - Updated some overlays for compatibility with AAPT2
    - Do not expect everything to work. This is just a hotfix for android 14 QPR2.

## App Changes:
- Improved previews
- Updated translations
- And many more improvements...

Also included in this version are bug fixes and other improvements.
